data.title: Actress Pooja Sharma Getting Married on October 24th
meta_keywords: Best Online News portal from Nepal focusing on Political

data.text:
Actress Pooja Sharma is set to embark on a new chapter in her life as she prepares to tie the knot this year.

As reported by Filmy Khabar.com, the talented actress has announced her plans to marry her beloved Yudhha Baniya on the auspicious occasion of Vijayadashami. Sharing the joyous news herself, Pooja revealed that the wedding ceremony will take place during the grand festival of Dashain. This year, Dashain falls on the 24th of October, the date chosen for their union.

She said, “We are preparing for the wedding in Dashain. This year, we are going to get married because it is good during Dashain,” as reported by Filmy Khabar.com.

Pooja and Yudhha have been in a committed relationship for approximately three years. The actress had publicly acknowledged their love affair during the release of her film ‘Ma Yesto Geet Gauchhu 2’. Since then, the couple has been seen together at various public events. Pooja and Yudhha first crossed paths through a mutual family member.

On Yudhha’s birthday last year, Pooja expressed her deep affection for him, referring to him as the greatest gift from God. She wrote, “You are the best gift that God has bestowed upon me. I will love you forever. You entered my life when I was broken, and now you are the reason behind the smile on my face, the twinkle in my eyes, and the happiness in my life.”
